subject: CreateProcess error (JUnit and Visual J++)
msgSnippet: Hi, I am trying to use JUnit 3.7 with Visual J++ on Windows 2000. When trying to run junit.samples.AllTests I get java.io.IOException: CreateProcess exceptions
messageBody:
Hi,

I am trying to use JUnit 3.7 with Visual J++ on Windows 2000.

When trying to run junit.samples.AllTests I get java.io.IOException:
CreateProcess exceptions (actual output is at the end of this
message).

Does anyone have idea what is going wrong? Any help would be greatly
appreciated.

Regards,

Krishna


-------------------------

jview junit.textui.TestRunner -c junit.samples.AllTests


.........................................
.........................................
....E.E.E
Time: 0.765
There were 3 errors:
